knimeNode.name: Subset Matcher
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node matches all subsets of the first input table with all sets of the second input table.

fullDescription.intro: The node matches all subsets of the first input table with all sets of the second input table. The result table contains pairs of matching subsets and sets. The node can be used to find all transactions that match a given list of item sets.
fullDescription.option: The column that contains the subsets to search for
The id of the set to search in.
The column that contains sets to search in
The matching set is appended if this option is ticked. A new row is created for each matching set.
